headline: Walgreens Supporting Patients, Customers and Communities Ahead of Approaching Winter Storms
summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., January 23, 2026--As severe winter storms and dangerously cold temperatures are forecasted across the country this weekend, Walgreens is taking proactive steps to support the safety and well-being of its patients, team members and communities. Walgreens is monitoring the trajectory of winter storms closely and encourages all team members and patients in the impacted regions to follow guidance from local authorities and prioritize their safety and well-being.
